dialogue.text: wow it feel weird meeting you in person, huh\nwhat are you doing here?
im guessing you/'re hanging out with GF, after\nall this is the plaza.
welp, my friends are waiting for me but since you're here i was wondering if you could help me out, is that cool?
Basically im working on this new project of mine, but it got lyrics and lets say no one has recorded you actually singing in english...
so. i was wondering if you would mind singing along with me so i can record some samples? you're THE boyfriend after all.
yeah! well, as soon as we start with the first song i'll send you the song files with my phone, follow my lead. Are you ready?
